channel.title: Web Scraping on
channel.description: Recent content in Web Scraping on

item.title: List of lists of different length to a data frame
item.description: When scraping data from an internet page it is commun that it is not nicely formatted in table kind of way. To me it happens a lot that you get a list of lists and that the second layer of lists have different lengths. To convert this kind of data can be tricky so I made an example here. It is a shiny application that reads data from the eredivisie beach site and uses it to culculate the current standings for the wildcards for the EC.
